item.title: Mare add a quote by Scott Westerfield
item.description: "The human heart is a strange vessel. Love and hatred can exist side by side." -- Scott Westerfield

item.title: Mare add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Classic' - a book which people praise and don't read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Mare add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Good books don't give up all their secrets at once." -- Stephen King

item.title: Mare add a quote by Ursula K. Le Guin
item.description: "It is good to have an end to journey toward, but it is the journey that matters in the end." -- Ursula K. Le Guin

item.title: Mare add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Mare add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The man who does not read has no advantage over the man who cannot read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Mare add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Mare add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "Books serve to show a man that those original thoughts of his aren't very new after all." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Mare add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "I have been driven many times upon my knees by the overwhelming conviction that I had no where else to go. My own wisdom and that of all about me seemed insufficient for that day." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Mare add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Mare add a quote by Molly Ivins
item.description: "The first rule of holes: When you're in one stop digging." -- Molly Ivins

item.title: Mare add a quote by Molly Ivins
item.description: "Politics is not a picture on a wall or a television sitcom that you can decide you don't much care for." -- Molly Ivins

item.title: Mare add a quote by Kathy Griffin
item.description: "I was raised right — I talk about people behind their backs. It's called manners." -- Kathy Griffin

item.title: Mare add a quote by Jay Asher
item.description: "You don’t know what goes on in anyone’s life but your own. And when you mess with one part of a person’s life, you’re not messing with just that part. Unfortunately, you can’t be that precise and selective. When you mess with one part of a person’s life, you’re messing with their entire life. Everything. . . affects everything." -- Jay Asher

item.title: Mare add a quote by Molly Ivins
item.description: "I believe that ignorance is the root of all evil. And that no one knows the truth." -- Molly Ivins

item.title: Mare add a quote by Jay Asher
item.description: "No one knows for certain how much impact they have on the lives of other people. Oftentimes, we have no clue. Yet we push it just the same." -- Jay Asher

item.title: Mare add a quote by Stephen Chbosky
item.description: "And in that moment, I swear we were infinite." -- Stephen Chbosky

item.title: Mare add a quote by Stephen Chbosky
item.description: "I would die for you. But I won't live for you." -- Stephen Chbosky

item.title: Mare add a quote by Tiffanie DeBartolo
item.description: "We’re all searching for something to fill up what I like to call that big, God-shaped hole in our souls. Some people use alcohol, or sex, or their children, or food, or money, or music, or heroin. A lot of people even use the concept of God itself. I could go on and on. I used to know a girl who used shoes. She had over two-hundred pairs. But it’s all the same thing, really. People, for some stupid reason, think they can escape their sorrows." -- Tiffanie DeBartolo

item.title: Mare add a quote by Tiffanie DeBartolo
item.description: "Just knowing you exist changed the world for me." -- Tiffanie DeBartolo

item.title: Mare add a quote by Tiffanie DeBartolo
item.description: "I’m afraid of everything. Fear of being alone, fear of being hurt, fear of being made a fool of, fear of failure... Still, I think all my fears bleed from one big one..." -- Tiffanie DeBartolo

item.title: Mare add a quote by Tiffanie DeBartolo
item.description: "It seemed cruelly unfair to me, even then, how fast your life can change before you have an opportunity to rethink your choices. We should get second chances on the big stuff. We should come equipped with erasers attached to the tops of our heads. Like pencils. We should be able to flip over and scribble away mistakes, at least once or twice during the duration of our existence, especially in matters of life and death." -- Tiffanie DeBartolo

item.title: Mare add a quote by Tiffanie DeBartolo
item.description: "I hate that word, CAN’T. I wish it had never been dreamed up, spoken, or defined. I wish the concept of CAN’T could be eradicated not only from language, but more importantly from the psyche of a girl who I know is filled with so much CAN it seeps out of her pores and scents the air." -- Tiffanie DeBartolo

item.title: Mare add a quote by Becca Fitzpatrick
item.description: "All this time I've hated myself for it. I thought I'd given it up for nothing. But if I hadn't fallen, I wouldn't have met you." -- Becca Fitzpatrick

item.title: Mare add a quote by Jillian Michaels
item.description: "The past does not define, you the present does." -- Jillian Michaels

item.title: Mare add a quote by Jillian Michaels
item.description: "Why choose to fail when success is an option?" -- Jillian Michaels

item.title: Mare add a quote by Jillian Michaels
item.description: "Selfish isn't a dirty word. It means we take care of ourselves and are able to give back." -- Jillian Michaels

item.title: Mare add a quote by Jillian Michaels
item.description: "Part of abandoning the all-or-nothing mentality is allowing yourself room for setbacks. We are bound to have lapses on the road to health and wellness, but it is critical that we learn how to handle small failures positively so that we can minimize their long-term destructive effects. One setback is one setback—it is not the end of the world, nor is it the end of your journey toward a better you." -- Jillian Michaels

item.title: Mare add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "The reason I talk to myself is because I’m the only one whose answers I accept." -- George Carlin

item.title: Mare add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "Think of how stupid the average person is, and realize half of them are stupider than that." -- George Carlin
